item.title: Load environment variables from a file in the terminal (zsh)
item.description: Load environment variables from a file* ðŸ”—To load shell environment variables from a simple KV configuration file like: click to zoom in Add this alias to your .zshrc file alias loadEnv='function _loadEnv() { set -o allexport; source $1; set +o allexport };_loadEnv' click to zoom in And you’ll be able to load environment variables really easy: click to zoom in
